about.heading: Atlanta's Most Trusted HVAC Team
about.description: For over 15 years, ClimateGuard HVAC has been Atlanta's go-to emergency HVAC specialists. We built our reputation on speed, reliability, and honest service—responding within 60 minutes when you need us most.
paragraphs: For over 15 years, ClimateGuard HVAC has been Atlanta's go-to emergency HVAC specialists. We built our reputation on speed, reliability, and honest service—responding within 60 minutes when you need us most.

Our NATE-certified technicians handle everything from emergency repairs to complete system replacements, always putting your comfort first. Family-owned and locally operated, we treat every home like our own.

services.title: Emergency AC Repair
services.description: AC down? We respond in 60 minutes. Available 24/7 for cooling emergencies.

services.title: Emergency Heating Repair
services.description: Furnace failure? Same-day emergency heating repair to restore warmth fast.

services.title: AC Installation & Replacement

services.title: Indoor Air Quality
services.description: Breathe easier with air purification, humidity control, and filtration systems.

process.heading: How We Get You Back to Comfort Fast

faq.question: How fast can you respond to an HVAC emergency?
faq.answer: We guarantee a 60-minute response time for all emergency calls in the Atlanta metro area. Our technicians are on-call 24/7, including weekends and holidays. When your system fails, we're already on our way.

faq.question: Do you offer financing for HVAC system replacements?
faq.answer: Yes. We offer flexible financing options with approved credit for new system installations and major repairs. Ask about our current 0% APR financing promotions. We believe everyone deserves comfortable temperatures, regardless of budget.

faq.question: Are your technicians certified and background-checked?
faq.answer: Absolutely. All NeverMissLead technicians are NATE-certified, EPA licensed, and undergo rigorous background checks. We also require ongoing training to stay current on the latest HVAC technology. You can trust who enters your home.

faq.question: What areas do you service in metro Atlanta?
faq.answer: We serve all of metro Atlanta including Fulton, DeKalb, Cobb, Gwinnett, and surrounding counties. If you're in the Atlanta area and need HVAC help, we can reach you within 60 minutes for emergencies.

faq.question: Do you provide warranties on repairs and installations?
faq.answer: Yes. All repairs come with a 90-day labor warranty. New system installations include manufacturer warranties up to 10 years on parts, plus our lifetime service guarantee. We stand behind every job we complete.
